name: Viking defence
description:
Defend and concure the rage of vikings once and for all!
The vikings are building fortresses and camps in order to take over all the land and you are the only one who dare to stand against them!

Lock and load - aim and fire!
Take them out by shooting them down,
You have limited shots on each level so make them count, target on the camps most vurnerable place to maximize the damage and move on to the next round!

Awesome game with great tunes and graphics that will keep you playing for a long time!

Viking defence - Defend the land and free the people!
